snippet: The Montreal Canadiens edged the Devils 2-1, extending their win streak to five games and tying them with the Pittsburgh Penguins at the top of the Eastern Conference standings.
abstract: NHL Roundup; Montreal Canadiens beat New Jersey Devils, 2-1; other hockey scores and news noted.
lead_paragraph: The Montreal Canadiens edged the Devils 2-1, extending their win streak to five games and tying them with the Pittsburgh Penguins at the top of the Eastern Conference standings.

headline.seo: Bad Bounce Dooms Devils; Islanders Move Past Rangers
headline.main: Bad Bounce Dooms Devils; Islanders Move Past Rangers
headline.print_headline: Bad Bounce Dooms Devils; Islanders Move Past Rangers
